structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 12, repealing 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 254, 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 312, and 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 205, effective July 1, 1986. -- Effective date amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 205, sec. 1. -- New section created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 312, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1984. -- Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 312, sec. 15, effective July 1, 1982 -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Intoxication not an offense giving rise to criminal or civil penalty.
metadata.lrc-note: . Acts 1986, ch. 336, รยง 13 provides: "It is the intent of the General Assembly that the amendments and repealers of Acts 1980, Chapter 254 and Acts 1982, Chapter 312 not become effective and that the statutes affected thereby remain as not amended or not repealed, except as affected by this Act or by legislation other than Acts 1980, Chapter 254; Acts 1982, Chapter 312; and Acts 1984, Chapter 205, passed during 1980, 1982 and 1984."
